body_html:
My torch version is 0.1.10，I solve this problem by two ways：

  • Change cuda(cuda_num) to cuda()，this works fine but the program runs at GPU 0 by default。Run the code by CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=num python xx.py to enforce it run at GPU num.
  • Follow the solution by soumith，I upgrade my torch version to 0.1.11，and the code works fine simply by python xx.py

Thanks a lot !!!!
body_text:
My torch version is 0.1.10，I solve this problem by two ways：

Change cuda(cuda_num) to cuda()，this works fine but the program runs at GPU 0 by default。Run the code by CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=num python xx.py to enforce it  run at GPU num.
Follow the solution by soumith，I upgrade my torch version to 0.1.11，and the code works fine simply by python xx.py

Thanks a lot !!!!
body:
My torch version is 0.1.10，I solve this problem by two ways：
- Change cuda(cuda_num) to cuda()，this works fine but the program runs at GPU 0 by default。Run the code by `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=num python xx.py` to enforce it  run at GPU num. 
- Follow the solution by soumith，I upgrade my torch version to 0.1.11，and the code works fine simply by `python xx.py`

Thanks a lot !!!!
